tools.title: JSON Studio
tools.description: Side-by-side JSON editor with diff, CSV import/export, Coralogix log reconstructor, and value extractor.

tools.title: String Tools • Line Breaks
tools.description: Makes the work with lists, strings, and SQL queries a bit more friendly

tools.title: TSV/CSV → JSON Converter
tools.description: Quick converter for tab-delimited (TSV) or simple CSV-like text to JSON.

tools.title: Query Generator
tools.description: Generate many Query statements from a CSV, replacing {placeholders} using column headers.

tools.title: Update SRS Generator
tools.description: Generate a JSON array payload for updateSRS=true for a list of IDs (one per line).

tools.title: Field Mapping Default Values Wizard
tools.description: Build FieldMappingDefaultValues payload from requestor CSV + pasted DB results, then optionally call the API.

tools.title: SQL CASE WHEN Generator

tools.title: Retry Specific SyncEngine
tools.description: Batch-call SyncEngine scheduleRetrySync for a list of IDs (with batching, retries, progress, and logs).

tools.title: JWT Decoder
